archimate:Requirement.name: SA.2.3.3b: b) an authenticator, such as a password, digital certificate (e.g. an x509 certificate) or an action (e.g. speech, writing on a pressure pad or using a biometric reader).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
